If a covariance matrix is used for observation weights assignment for a particular observation group, COVFLE is the name of the file holding the covariance matrix for that group. The roles of observation and prior information covariance matrices are discussed in section 3.7 of the PEST User Manual and in Doherty (2015). The formatting of observation covariance matrix files is discussed in section 4.19 of the PEST User Manual.
